about_the_game:
This art book is a collection of promotional/exclusive images released for the BL game The Divine Speaker from 2019.


What does it contain?
  • 37 pages of SFW & NSFW artworks (uncensored) from talented artists Fuyuure and Niken Anindita
  • Our forever love

content_descriptors.notes: Contains artworks of sexual nature of men.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
